jumboPacket.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirect.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirectTechnology.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation. Expected values are 'iWARP', 'RoCEv2', 'RoCE'

intents.description: The network intents assigned to the network reference pattern used for the deployment. Each intent will define its own name, traffic type, adapter names, and overrides as recommended by your OEM.

storageNetworks.description: List of StorageNetworks config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

storageConnectivitySwitchless.description: Defines how the storage adapters between nodes are connected either switch or switch less..

enableStorageAutoIp.description: Optional parameter required only for 3 Nodes switchless deployments. This allows users to specify IPs and Mask for Storage NICs when Network ATC is not assigning the IPs for storage automatically.

name.description: Name of the network intent you wish to create.

trafficType.description: List of network traffic types. Only allowed values are 'Compute', 'Storage', 'Management'.

adapter.description: Array of network interfaces used for the network intent.

overrideVirtualSwitchConfiguration.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideQosPolicy.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideAdapterProperty.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

vlanId.description: ID specified for the VLAN storage network. This setting is applied to the network interfaces that route the storage and VM migration traffic.

HciSetInformationJobProperties.description: Properties for setting information in the HCI cluster.

switchless.description: Set to represent if the system is configured in a switchless or switched configuration.

storageIntentAdapters.description: A string with a list of comma-separated name of the network adapters to use for the storage intent.

name.description: A string with the name of the storage intent. If not provided a default one storage is used.

vlanId.description: A string with a list of comma-separated vlan ids to use which should map exactly and in order to the adapters provided in StorageIntentAdapters. If not provided the system uses the defaults set by Network ATC.

jumboPacket.description: A string with the size to be set for jumbo packet frame size for the storage adapters.

networkDirect.description: A string to be set to enabled or disabled to specify if network direct mode should be enabled/disabled.

networkDirectTechnology.description: A string that specifies the network direct technology to be used. Possible values are iWARP, RoCE and RoCEv2.

priorityValue8021ActionCluster.description: A string to specify the 802.1Q priority for the cluster.

priorityValue8021ActionSMB.description: A string to specify the 802.1Q priority for SMB.

bandwidthPercentageSMB.description: A string to specify the bandwidth percentage to be used for SMB.

JobReportedProperties.description: Reported Properties for cluster job triggered from cloud.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

JobStatus.description: Represents the various statuses a job can have throughout its lifecycle.

values.name: NotSpecified
values.description: The job status has not been specified.

values.name: ValidationInProgress
values.description: The job is currently undergoing validation.

values.name: ValidationSuccess
values.description: The job has successfully passed validation.

values.name: ValidationFailed
values.description: The job has failed validation.

values.name: DeploymentInProgress
values.description: The job's deployment is currently in progress.

values.name: DeploymentFailed
values.description: The job's deployment has failed.

values.name: DeploymentSuccess
values.description: The job has been successfully deployed.

values.name: Invalid
values.description: The job status is invalid.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The job has succeeded.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The job has failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The job has been canceled.

values.name: Paused
values.description: The job is paused.

values.name: Scheduled
values.description: The job is scheduled to run.

LogCollectionReportedProperties.description: Represents the reported properties of a log collection job.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

logCollectionSessionDetails.description: Details of the log collection session.

LogCollectionSession.description: Represents a session for collecting logs from an edge device.

startTime.description: The timestamp when log collection started, in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: The timestamp when log collection ended, in ISO 8601 format.

timeCollected.description: The total time logs were collected for, in ISO 8601 duration format.

logSize.description: The size of the collected logs in bytes.

status.description: The status of the log collection session.

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for correlating this log collection session with other operations or sessions.

LogCollectionStatus.description: The status of log collection.Represents the status of a log collection operation.

values.name: None
values.description: Indicates that no log collection operation has been initiated.

values.name: InProgress
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation is currently in progress.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation has failed.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation has completed successfully.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Resource has been created.

values.name: Failed

values.name: Canceled

values.description: The resource is being provisioned

bandwidthPercentage_SMB.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

RemoteSupportAccessLevel.description: Defines the level of remote support access granted.

values.name: None
values.description: No remote support access is granted.

values.name: Diagnostics
values.description: Access is limited to diagnostics information only.

values.name: DiagnosticsAndRepair
values.description: Access includes diagnostics information and the ability to perform repairs.

RemoteSupportJobProperties.description: Represents the properties of a remote support job.

RemoteSupportNodeSettings.description: Represents the settings of a remote support node.

arcResourceId.description: The resource ID of the Azure Arc enabled server.

state.description: The state of the remote support node.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were created, in UTC.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were last updated, in UTC.

connectionStatus.description: The current connection status of the remote support session.

connectionErrorMessage.description: The error message, if any, from the last connection attempt.

transcriptLocation.description: The location where the session transcript is stored.

RemoteSupportReportedProperties.description: Represents the reported properties of a remote support job.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

nodeSettings.description: Optional settings for configuring the node for remote support.

sessionDetails.description: Details of the remote support session.

sessionStartTime.description: The start time of the remote support session, in UTC.

sessionEndTime.description: The end time of the remote support session, in UTC.

nodeName.description: The name of the node for which the session was initiated.

duration.description: The duration of the session in minutes.

accessLevel.description: The level of access granted during the remote support session.

RemoteSupportType.description: Defines the type of remote support action to be performed on an edge device.

values.name: Enable
values.description: Enables remote support for the edge device.

values.name: Revoke
values.description: Revokes previously granted remote support access for the edge device.
